sections.intro_title: The Strongest and Most Perfect PP Angel
sections.intro_text: This is a Heimin memorial dedicated to sharing memories of Amane Kanata and preserving the time we spent with her forever. Her voice, her smile, and countless memories she left us will live on in our hearts.
sections.contribute_message: Want to share your thoughts? Click the button below.
sections.contribute_art: Want to share your artwork? Click the button below.
